question: In recent years, people watch more movies from overseas. What are the reasons for this? Should the government give financial support to local cinema to produce local films?
text: In the modern world, many individuals are concerned about the increasing number of viewers of oversea movies. In this regard, the majority of people in the society believe that the financial backing of local film makers would be beneficial for the local people. However, there are many obstacles to solve this problem.

There is no denying that the main cause of popularity of movies from oversea is developed film business. It is widely known that the countries, such as the USA and Canada, have many well-qualified specialists and professionals in the flick business. Consequently, their movies can attract more people's attention. To illustrate, the last sequel of games of thrones in the UK makes over a billion profit. Furthermore, many well-known celebrities are willing to work in that industry. As a result, they gather more viewers for the flick, which they are stored. A good illustration of this is Jackie Chan, who is popular because of his tricks and wonderful talent.

On the other hand, many individuals believe that the financial backing of local film business can alleviate the situation, and lit the fire to create more high quality films. It is true that some local cinemas have problems with the investment, because investors prefer to invest money for the prosperous services. In this regard, the government support can help local cinemas to develop their services. For example, many Russian movies are shooting with the backing of the authorities. Moreover, financial support from the authorities would help to attract more celebrities to the local flick industry. As a result, they can gather more viewers. To illustrate, many developing countries try to hire as many celebrities as possible in order to attract people's attention.

In conclusion, although many people are keen to watch over sea movies, the support of authorities can help to the local cinemas to progress and gather more viewers. In addition, it will help to hire many well-known personalities in order to make higher quality films.
